PHRASE.LANG: This three-sided creature will never leave your side! It runs, swims in the air around your head and sits on your shoulder for a rest. [#Legal]
Cette créature vous tiendra toujours à l'oeil! Kat Zieux court, nage dans les airs autour de votre tête, et s'assied sur votre épaule pour se reposer. [#Legal]
Dieser kleine Geschöpf wird Sie nie verlassen! Es läuft, schwimmt in der Luft um den Kopf, und sitzt auf der Schulter.[#Legal]
Questa creatura a tre occhi non ti abbandonerà mai! Corre, nuota in aria ed attorno alla tua testa e si siede sulla tua spalla per riposare. [#Legal]
Esta criatura irresistible Nunca te dejaré! Tres Occi corre, nada en el aire, y se sienta en su hombro para descansar. [#Legal]
This three-sided creature will never leave your side! It runs, swims in the air around your head and sits on your shoulder for a rest. [#Legal]
This three-sided creature will never leave your side! It runs, swims in the air around your head and sits on your shoulder for a rest. [#Legal]
